parameter.Value: 成功
select l.uid,l.title,l.nickname,l.rid,u.avatar from live_resource l join live_user u on u.uid=l.uid where l.tid=

SELECT h.rid,h.cid,h.uid,h.content,h.replycid,h.is_quote,h.update_time,h.`status`,h.nickname,live_user.avatar from live_user join (SELECT live_resource.rid,live_comment.cid,live_comment.uid,live_comment.content,live_comment.replycid,live_comment.is_quote,live_comment.update_time,live_comment.`status`,live_comment.nickname from live_resource join live_comment on live_resource.rid=live_comment.rid where live_resource.tid='TID' and live_comment.type='1' and (live_comment.`status` not like '3') ORDER BY live_comment.update_time desc LIMIT PERPAGE)h on h.uid=live_user.uid
SELECT c.rid,c.cid,c.uid,c.content,c.replycid,c.is_quote,c.update_time,c.`status`,c.nickname,u.avatar from live_comment c JOIN live_user u on u.uid=c.uid where cid='CID'
select aid,url from live_attachment where uid='UID' and cid='CID' ORDER BY aid asc
成功
